CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, March 13, 1948, pg. 16 reads: "Band Poll Winners to Be Named on Mar. 27 - Snowed Under - Proof of just how much the public took to The Courier's fifth annual pool is vividly shown in this photo taken at The Courier promotion office in downtown Pittsburgh. These girls are handling just a partial load of the ballots that came in from all over the country. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five women, including one on right wearing houndstooth suit and eyeglasses, seated around table in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper office sorting ballots for the 1947-1948 Musical Favorites promotion, seen from above
